name: Strike True
description:
Two fearsome warriors stand before you -- but you know that if you can just find the right moment, they can both be taken down with a single strike!

This definitely ended up being more of a prototype than I had hoped. However, I am still quite happy with the feel of the game. This is the first time any project of mine has reached a state resembling a functional game, so I am grateful for for the experience. Thank you GMTK and all my fellow jammers who helped and inspired me!

WASD keys to move.

Left mouseclick to attack.

Space to roll. You are invulnerable while rolling!

Shift to block.

R to restart.

Enter to move to the second level.

F4 to toggle fullscreen.
